title: Susceptible to Him
description: Lia Risso walked in on her fiancé and three other women on Valentine’s Day. Two celibate years later, her roommate creates a profile for Lia on a dating website—without her knowledge—and sets up a date. On Valentine’s Day.Ryan Walsh, a self-made millionaire and libertine, refuses to commit to any one woman. Tossed from foster home to foster home as a child, Ryan is on guard against becoming vulnerable ever again.One dinner…one night of dancing and flirting with the attraction between them, puts both Lia and Ryan in danger of heart break.They have a choice—open themselves to the possibility of hurt or walk away, never knowing what might have been.
author: Lynn Burke
